statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM Patients WHERE dosage_schedule = 'once daily';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage_schedule = 'twice daily';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE medication_name = 'Insulin';
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE dosage_schedule = 'Morning';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patients WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medication_name = 'Tylenol' AND dosage_schedule = 'Night';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address ILIKE '%Los Angeles%';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, date_prescribed FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, date_prescribed FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, schedule FROM patients INNER JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, schedule FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE prescription_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT doctor_id, medication_name, dosage FROM DoctorPrescriptions WHERE doctor_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE dosage = '10mg' ORDER BY medication_name ASC, prescription_id DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM MedicationInventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quantity >= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM DoctorPrescriptions GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_prescriptions > 5;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM MedicationInventory GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;

SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, schedule FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%' AND schedule IN ('daily', 'twice a day') ORDER BY patient_id ASC, prescription_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_amount, dosage_frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, dosage_schedule, start_date, end_date FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT prescription_id, patient_name, medication_name, dosage_taken FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id JOIN dosage_logs ON prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_logs.prescription_id WHERE dosage_taken > 0;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_name, start_date, end_date, dosage_schedule FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM medication_history WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_history WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, time_schedule FROM medication_schedule WHERE patient_id = '12345' AND dosage = 100.0;
SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50;
SELECT doctor_name, prescription_details, prescription_date FROM doctor_prescriptions WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
